message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life.

In accounting terms, this refers to depreciation, which is the method of allocating the cost of a tangible asset over its useful life.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see there is a specific line item labeled "Depreciation" in the Cash Flow From Operating Activities section. This is exactly what I'm looking for.

The value associated with the Depreciation line item is 45,742.50 as of 2024-01-31.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45742.50'}}
```
